ShipSwap.1-Selene: Hey, could I ask you for a favor?
ShipSwap.2-Selene: We've got an order for a ship with very specific parts, which we don't have in stock right now...
ShipSwap.3-Selene: And who would have thought, your ship has exactly the parts we need!
ShipSwap.4-Selene: We could swap you for another ship.
Action-Tooltip: Swap your ship to a random different one. Lose all ship-specific artifacts for your current ship. Gain all starting artifacts for the new ship. Optionally gain any starting cards for the new ship.
